data.title: UNKLE's War Stories
data.text:
James Lavelle and Richard File are back together and have finished UNKLE's third album "War Stories". It has been four years since their last outing "Never, Never, Land". The latest sees a crew of guest vocalists like Oueens of the Stone Age frontman Josh Homme, 3D from Massive Attck (both were on "Never, Never, Land"), Ian Astbury from The Cult and many others. "War Stories" also marks the singing debut for James Lavelle, who duets with Richard File on 'Morning Rage' and goes solo on 'Hold My Hand'.

This CD will feature custom paintings from 3D in a 32 page booklet. The limited edition will have a second instrumental disc as well as a 50 page booklet. All of this will be released on Lavellle's new label Surrender All. UNKLE will also be touring this summer as a band for the first time. Tour dates are listed on the official site.

War Stories will be released on June 20th in Japan, July 9th in Europe/Australia and July 24th in the US.

Tracklisting

Disc One

01. Intro

02. Chemistry (feat. Josh Homme from "Queens of the Stone Age")

03. Hold My Hand

04. Restless (feat. Josh Homme from "Queens of the Stone Age")

05. Keys To The Kingdom (feat. Gavin Clark from "Clayhill")

06. Price You Pay

07. Burn My Shadow (feat. Ian Astbury from "The Cult")

08. May Day (feat. The Dute Spirit)

09. Persons & Machinery (feat. Autolux)

10. Twilight (feat. 3D from "Massive Attack")

11. Morning Rage

12. Lawless

13. Broken (feat. Gavin Clark from "Clayhill")

14. When Things Explode (feat. Ian Astbury from "The Cult")

15. Buying A Lie (feat. Lee Gorton from "The Alfie")

16. Mistress (feat. Alice Temple)

Disc Two - Instrumental

01. Hold My Hand

02. Restless

03. Keys To The Kingdom

04. Price You Pay

05. Burn My Shadow

06. MayDay

07. Persons & Machinery

08. Twilight

09. Morning Rage

10. Lawless

11. Broken

12. When Things Explode
